column1: In a budget increase scenario, performance and availability are prioritized.
The infrastructure is enhanced, with the size of the Web and Application server instances increased, and larger RDS instances with Multi-AZ are utilized
Additionally, CloudWatch and CloudTrail are deployed for logging, monitoring, and observing the entire system to improve performance tracking capabilities.

* AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
